attributes.action: to scrap the proposed plans to share the BBC TV  Licence Fee with ITV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government should allow, ITV plc and all other companies with a stake in Channel Three, to go under.  Commercial Television, is meant to be funded by Commercials, not the tax payer. If ITV does go under, reopen channel 3 to the highest bider, make it viable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
